instructions: If you re looking at the calendar on your Apple Watch, wake your iPhone, then open the App Switcher. (On an iPhone with Face ID, swipe up from the bottom edge and pause; on an iPhone with a Home button, double-click the Home button.) Tap the button that appears at the bottom of the screen to open the Calendar app. Add an event, or change an existing one.
Open the Calendar app on your iPhone. Tap the event. Tap Alert, then choose a different interval.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Calendar.
